Name: Suit & Tai
Ingredients: 25 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Tiki-styled cocktail based on aged rum and brandy with lime juice, orange liqueur and almond syrup.
History: Created in 2015 by Matthew Neale at Harbour Kitchen in Torquay, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Suit & Tai contains 216 calories
